testcase.name: Shopping Cart Module Tests › TC018: View Empty Cart @smoke @regression
testcase.system-out: ✅ Cart is empty as expected

testcase.system-out: ✅ Cart contains all 3 products ✅ Cart total calculated correctly: $55.97

testcase.system-out: ✅ Sauce Labs Backpack removed successfully ✅ Cart badge updated correctly

testcase.name: Shopping Cart Module Tests › TC022: Remove All Items from Cart @regression
testcase.system-out: ✅ All items removed, cart is empty ✅ Cart badge hidden after removing all items

testcase.name: Shopping Cart Module Tests › TC023: Cart Persistence Across Navigation @regression
testcase.system-out: ✅ Cart count persisted across navigation ✅ Cart contents persisted across navigation

testcase.name: Shopping Cart Module Tests › TC024: Cart Item Quantity Validation @regression
testcase.system-out: ✅ Product add button correctly shows Remove state ✅ Cart shows single item with correct quantity

testcase.system-out: ✅ All checkout step 1 elements are present ✅ Successfully proceeded to checkout step 2

testcase.system-out: ⚠️ Validation error detected - remaining on checkout step 1 ✅ Empty postal code validation working correctly

testcase.system-out: ✅ All checkout step 2 elements are present ✅ Order summary shows correct items ✅ Price calculations correct: Subtotal: $29.99, Tax: $2.4, Total: $32.39

testcase.name: Checkout Process Module Tests › TC030: Complete Checkout Process @smoke @regression
testcase.system-out: ✅ Order completed successfully ✅ Order confirmation page displayed correctly ✅ Complete checkout process successful

testcase.name: Checkout Process Module Tests › TC031: Checkout with Multiple Items @regression
testcase.system-out: ✅ Multiple items checkout - Subtotal: $55.97

testcase.name: Checkout Process Module Tests › TC032: Checkout Cancel Functionality @regression
testcase.system-out: ✅ Successfully cancelled checkout from step 1 ✅ Cart contents preserved after cancellation ✅ Successfully cancelled checkout from step 2

testcase.name: End-to-End User Journey Tests › E2E001: Complete Purchase Flow - Single Product @smoke @e2e
testcase.system-out:
⏱️ Login completed in 5006ms 🔍 Product discovery completed in 197ms - Selected: Sauce Labs Onesie 🛒 Product added to cart in 76ms 📋 Cart reviewed in 803ms 📝 Customer information entered in 8075ms 💰 Order total: $8.63 (Subtotal: $7.99, Tax: $0.64) 📊 Order reviewed in 156ms ✅ Purchase completed in 2592ms 🎉 E2E Purchase flow completed successfully
📈 Performance Summary: Login: 5006ms Product Discovery: 197ms Add to Cart: 76ms Cart Review: 803ms Checkout Step 1: 8075ms Order Review: 156ms Complete Purchase: 2592ms Total E2E Time: 16905ms
